dcterms:creator: R. Aebi
M. Nagasawa
dcterms:description: A dataset related to the study of large deviations and the propagation of chaos for Schrödinger processes, focusing on the mathematical formulation and properties of the Schrödinger bridge.
dcterms:title: Schrödinger bridge

dcterms:creator: W. Zhang
M. Zhu
K. G. Derpanis
dcterms:description: A large dataset containing video clips with 13 joints annotated in all frames, including head, shoulders, elbows, wrists, hips, knees, and ankles.
dcterms:title: Penn Action Dataset

dcterms:creator: H. Jhuang
J. Gall
S. Zufﬁ
C. Schmid
M. J. Black
dcterms:description: A dataset aimed at understanding action recognition, containing various action categories and annotated video clips.
dcterms:title: sub-JHMDB Dataset

dcterms:creator: C. Bunne
Y.-P. Hsieh
M. Cuturi
A. Krause
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides a closed form for the Schrödinger bridge between Gaussian measures, contributing to the understanding of optimal transport problems.
dcterms:title: Gaussian measures

dcterms:creator: J.-D. Benamou
Y. Brenier
dcterms:description: A dataset related to the computational fluid mechanics solution to the Monge-Kantorovich mass transfer problem, providing insights into optimal transport theory.
dcterms:title: Optimal transport problem

dcterms:creator: R. Aebi
dcterms:description: A dataset that explores Schrödinger diffusion processes, contributing to the understanding of stochastic processes and their applications.
dcterms:title: Schrödinger diffusion processes

dcterms:creator: B. D. Anderson
J. B. Moore
dcterms:description: A dataset related to optimal control methods, specifically linear quadratic methods, providing foundational knowledge for control theory.
dcterms:title: Stochastic control

dcterms:creator: M. Born
dcterms:description: A dataset that discusses quantum mechanics, specifically focusing on scattering processes and their mathematical formulations.
dcterms:title: Quantum mechanics

dcterms:creator: T. Chen
G.-H. Liu
E. Theodorou
dcterms:description: A dataset that focuses on likelihood training of the Schrödinger bridge using forward-backward stochastic differential equations, contributing to generative AI.
dcterms:title: Diffusion models for generative AI

dcterms:creator: K. F. Caluya
A. Halder
dcterms:description: A dataset that presents Wasserstein proximal algorithms for the Schrödinger bridge problem, focusing on density control with nonlinear drift.
dcterms:title: Wasserstein proximal algorithms
